comments: This is by far, the least professor I have enjoyed having. Her class is so boring, hard, and she is not clear on her assignments. She seems uninterested in answering questions and not to mention she makes her students to read her material (her job). I dropped this class as soon as the 1st session was over.

Took this professor back in 2011 and she was very unclear with everything and a very hard grader. I didn\'t like her very much. We had a journal every week and had about 4 essays the entire semester. I would look elsewhere for another english professor.
This professor is not clear on what she wants done. She won\'t reply to your messages until a week after. You have to teach a lesson because she "doesn\'t want to do it all herself"
Funny and helpful. This is a comp class not a grammar class. Shr is always available durimg office hours. Read and write assignments on time and you will shine
you use something called turnitin.com and she\'s very slow at giving feed back on your work so you don\'t really know how you\'re doing i dropped the class because of that.
Do NOT take this teacher !!! She\'s confusing and unorganized!!! Do NOT waist your money or time with her !!!

GIVES A LOT OF ASSIGNMENTS DO NOT RECOMEND HER IF YOU DO NOT LIKE TWR ESSAYS, AT TIMES SHE IS RUDE AND NEVER EXPLANES THE ESSAYS WE HAVE TO DO. SHE MAKES YOU DO A LOT OF JOURNALS AND YOU HAVE TO READ SEVERAL STORIES (READ THEM ON TIME)TWO RESEARCH PAPERS ABOUT 6-10 PAGES LONG WITH ANNOTATED BIBLIOGRAPHY DO NOT WAIST YOUR TIME AND MONEY IF YOUR LAZY

This is ENGLISH class, so watch your grammar and spelling -- that is where you lose points in grades. You will learn how to write an essay, especially an argument essay. Very useful for future classes.

SHE IS CONFUSSING AND DO NOT HELP AT ALL. WE NEVER KNOW THE ASSIGMENTS DATES AND SHE IS FEMINIST AND DO NOT CARE ABOUT OUR OPINIONS. DO NOT TAKE THE COURSE WITH HER. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY AND TIME WITH HER PLEASE.

Do not I repeat take this professor, all my hard work in the class getting assignments turned in on time received myself a D while all my friends got a B which doesn\'t seem fair at all. And I never skipped a class at all!

I received a D in this course, and I was always on top my assignments and always ready for the day before hand. I emailed the professor to see if I could change her mind, she hasn\'t replied yet. But all my friends had received B which was weird because I worked my butt off. I have to now take this class over again, DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
Do not take professor barris!
SHE IS KIND of serious. but if you do all the journal and essays and u will get an easy B

She is a very hard grader, and does not give clear instructions to the assignments given. She seemed a bit biased as well towards Caucasian students, despite those students doing less than others. She\'s also very opinionated and will sometimes grade harder if she is against your argumentative paper.
she is a nice women. i took her on summer. i got C but i deserve it bc from 12 journal i only did 9. plus the grammar sucks. my advise is just do her journals and essays.
Prof. Barris gives a lot of assignment. Tons of journals. She does not grade the essay too hard though. She is very unhelpful. If you ask her a question, she will say "what does the syllabus say"

She is a very good professor. Yes, she gives a lot of writings, but its all for your own good. She makes you understand, and know you can do it yourself, which is the primary purpose of the class. Note:Her class is not for the lazy students; if you want to be equiped to face the challenges of life, TAKE HER CLASS. SHE IS VERY NICE AND UNDERSTANDING

Bad Attitude. she doesnt teach everything is left for homework and we just discuss in class what we read or wrote for homework. dont even think of asking her a question her answer is..what did i say..what does the syllabbus say, not to mention her syllabus doesnt even match what we do..HATE this class!

Very unhappy with this professor. Im not quit sure exactly what I really learned from her. It is just a bunch of writing journals and essays. she is not very helpful either. She ALWAYS has an attitude every class. Wouldnt recommend taking her if you want a friendly helpful prof.
Loved this teacher...this woman follows her syllabus to the "T", yes she may not be exciting but if you pay attention and try your best you can pass.
